# NeurozineÂ®

## Description
A Huperzine-A supplement focused on cognitive clarity, memory recall, and sustained focus by supporting acetylcholine activity.

## Site structure

### Homepage (/)
- Overview of the product's purpose and intended cognitive benefits (clarity, memory, focus)
- Explanation of how Huperzine-A supports acetylcholine for learning and recall
- Interactive brain-reaction speed assessment with result context
- Product information, dosage options (400 mcg, 800 mcg), and purchasing

### Quality portal (/quality/coa)
- Batch number or QR code lookup for certificates of analysis
